channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan’s Cabinet Approves White Terror Remembrance Day
item.description: May 19 has been made an annual memorial day for Taiwan’s White Terror period of political violence.

item.title: Two Nannies in Taipei Indicted for Death of Child
item.description: Two nannies in Taipei have been indicted for the death a one-year-old boy. The charges come amid several high-profile child abuse cases in Taiwan.

item.title: 5 Ministers Named for Welfare, Diversity Initiatives Under Incoming Taiwan Gov't
item.description: Five ministers have been announced to head Taiwan's initiatives tackling environmental, labor and cultural diversity issues.

item.title: Judge's Suicide Inspires 'White Flower' Judicial Reform Movement in Taiwan
item.description: Taiwan's legal community is demanding judicial reforms after a 38-year-old judge took his own life on April 12. The suicide has sparked conversations about workload pressure and ot
